DIALOGUE.name: Juniper
message: These grounds are protected by the rangers. No one can go without our permission

DIALOGUE.name: Ren
message: Have you done something 'interesting' lately, like dark magic?

DIALOGUE.name: Iris
message: Are you the ones ... D-Destroying our home...?

DIALOGUE.name: Siegfried
message: What! No! There must have been a mistake.

DIALOGUE.name: Sebastian
message: Worry not about us, we're on a important mission.

DIALOGUE.name: Robin
message: We woudn't think to destroy your *ahem* bug infested *ahem* beautiful home!

DIALOGUE.name: Ren
message: That's something a dark wizard would say... or a necromancer...
Whatever, the point is, we'll rip the truth out of you, one way or another.

DIALOGUE.name: Bravo
message: Can we cut to the chase already?
I have an important appointment soon and I don't want to be late.

DIALOGUE.name: Juniper
message: Let's drive these fiends out of our home!
